data.name: Hentai Cast: Podcast Simulator
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1907630/Beauties_Academy__Spellcraft_Tournament/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1808040/On_my_own_A_Hot_Isekai_Adventure/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1872580/Ghostly_Moans/


About the Game



Record your audience's lewd stories while you Make choices about them to raise your podcast popularity. Manage your money, Buy equipment, Make ad campaigns and Receive emails with the sexual adventures of your fans. Play a simulation game with visual novel features in which choices matter.

Features


  • Record your lewd audience's story to raise your podcast popularity;
  • Decide where your audience's story go by making choices;
  • Grow your fanbase by making different choices and unlocking unique endings for the same story;
  • A lot of CGs to unlock;
  • More than 100,000 words of stories;
  • Manage your money to become famous quickly and to deliver the best episodes to your audience;
  • Buy equipment to create your own professional home studio;

data.short_description: Record your audience's lewd stories while you Make choices about them to raise your podcast popularity. Manage your money, Buy equipment, Make ad campaigns and Receive emails with the sexual adventures of your fans. Play a simulation game with visual novel features in which choices matter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: A FREE DLC will be available for those who want NSFW content. Hentai Cast: Podcast Simulator contains strong language and the story revolves around sexual content. You'll be managing a podcast that receives sex-related stories, but you'll not have access to any sexual scenes, nudity, or anything similar to pornographic content.
